wikitext.*:
'''Inthavros''' was the "forest palace" of [[Tavros (wood-fay)|Tavros]], the chief [[Tavari|wood-fay]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name="Int"/>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Inthavros'' is in [[Gnomish]]. It consists of the element ''[[in-]]'' ("house of") and the proper name ''Tavros''.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1463160189.html|articlename=G. ''Inthavros'' loc.|website=Eldamo|accessed=28 March 2022}}</ref>

An earlier name for the place was ''Intavros''.<ref name="Int">{{PE|11}}, p. 51</ref>
